details.top:
Abdullaah Ibn Qays (radhi-yAllaahu 'anhu) related that The Prophet (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) said to him:

O 'Abdullaah Ibn Qays, shall I not inform you of a treasure from the treasures of paradise?

He (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) then said: Say:
details.arabic_diacless: لا حول ولا قوة إلا باللٰه
details.arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ
details.transliteration: Laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaah.
details.translations: There is no might nor power except with Allaah.
